data.name: Heron Data
data.description: At Heron, we use the latest advances in AI and LLMs to automate document-heavy workflows. Our software handles emails, analyzes attachments, and takes actions like updating CRMs or requesting more info. We serve businesses from small companies to FDIC-insured banks in sectors like Small Business Finance and Commercial Insurance.
data.one_liner: We automate document-heavy workflows in financial services and beyond

data.name: Glimpse
data.description: Glimpse helps retail brands automate their identify and fight invalid fees & streamline the cash reconciliation process &  from their retailers & distributors using AI. Imagine a beverage company sold $100k worth of goods to Whole Foods & only got paid $60k. The deducted $40k comes in hundreds of long PDF’s with obscure codes that a team has to manually review every single one of to ensure the fees are valid. A % of these fees are always invalid and brands have to go through a lengthy process to get back money owed to them. We automate this whole process - saving a brand dozens of hours a week & recouping them 2-3% of their topline sales. Our vision is to become an AI BPO for retail brands.
data.one_liner: Glimpse offers AI services for retail brands starting with deductions

data.name: Arketa
data.description: All in one platform for online and in-person classes, video on-demand, courses and website hosting.
data.one_liner: Everything for your fitness or wellness business.

data.name: Lightdash
data.description: Lightdash is an open-source Looker alternative. It's built on top of dbt and lets users centralise all their team's business logic in one place.
